name: Lightning-Riding Treasure Hunter (I)
achievementgroup: Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I

stage1.description: Open 100 Chests on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

stage2.description: Open 200 Chests on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

stage3.description: Open 300 Chests on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.
